commits.message: fix(api): enable cross-module imports in pytest

verification: Ran: git commit -m 'fix(api): enable cross-module imports in pytest'
Ran: cd api && uv run python -c 'import sys; sys.path.insert(0, ".."); import ingest' (succeeded)
Ran: cd api && uv run pytest --collect-only tests/test_jit_forecast_integration.py (collected 5 tests)
notes: Created single semantic commit for api/tests/conftest.py
Ralph orchestrator files (.ralph/*) remain modified but were correctly excluded from commit
All acceptance criteria verified: cross-module imports work, pytest collection succeeds
